resources.string:
Hi, my name is Adrian 

 I have been writing code for the last six years 

 I write code in Python, Java, Php and JavaScript mainly 

 I am currently learning Android Kotlin and Scheme 

 Future Language Stacks include: Haskell, Clojure and Elm 

 Some online resources include: Cognitiveclass.ai, Harvard CS50 and hackerrank 

 My current read is Structure and Intepretation of Computer Programs 

 My hobbies include: reading, swimming, cycling, basketball and playing video games 

 I write articles in my spare time too 

 I love fish 

 I will be happy to show you how to make your own aquarium
